summary: The implementation successfully addresses all five requirements related to improving text visibility and contrast across the application. Enhanced gradient overlays, stronger color tokens, increased font weights, and drop-shadow effects were applied to ensure WCAG AA compliance. All components specified in the BuildRequest were modified with evidence of improved contrast for text on background images.

hallucinated_features.description: MetalTicker component received text visibility enhancements with drop-shadow utilities and increased font-weights
hallucinated_features.reason: The MetalTicker component was not mentioned in any of the five requirements. The BuildRequest focused on HeroSection, ContactSection, ProductCard, and LiveRatesDashboard only.
